description: Your rule over party is still shaky. Some of the older politicians question your rule behind the scenes. One of them, and pretty influential one, is our whip. This old fart always doubted your abilities and embraced his own grandson instead. Getting rid of him will be an important signal for all your opponents, but will seriously harm our party's integrity, so you should do it at the right time.

options.description: We will find a way to get him...

title: The old fart
